entry.value: SELECT CAST(H_Score AS INTEGER) AS HomeScore, * FROM FLOWFILE
SELECT *, CASE WHEN H_Score > A_Score THEN 'HomeWin' WHEN H_Score < A_Score THEN 'AwayWin' ELSE 'Draw' END AS match_result_category FROM FLOWFILE
SELECT COALESCE(H_Throw_in, 0) AS H_Throw_in, COALESCE(A_Throw_in, 0) AS A_Throw_in, COALESCE(H_Yellow_Cards, 0) AS H_Yellow_Cards, COALESCE(A_Yellow_Cards, 0) AS A_Yellow_Cards, * FROM FLOWFILE
